changelog: - Show the file name in list.
- Show only audio title when selecting audio.
- Fix the app always asking storage permission on Android 10.
- Pauses the radio player when leaving the app (such as during a phone call).
- Dismiss radio player when back button is pressed.
- Checks if there is an update every time you open the app.
- Added copy title option when selecting audio.
- Fix cannot open file from Download/Media.
